serviceName: AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Activation Service

actions.name: CompleteAccountRegistration
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the process of registering customer account for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Purchases

actions.name: CompleteFileUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to complete the process of uploading a Software file for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Purchases

actions.name: ConfirmAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to confirm asset ownership

actions.name: DownloadKickstart
actions.description: Grants permission to download the kickstart files for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software purchases

actions.name: DownloadSoftware
actions.description: Grants permission to download the Software files for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Purchases

actions.name: GenerateLicense
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a software license for an AWS Elemental Appliances and Software purchase

actions.name: GenerateLicenses
actions.description: Grants permission to generate Software Licenses for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Purchases

actions.name: GetArtifactGroupSoftwareVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the software version of an artifact group

actions.name: GetAsset
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an asset

actions.name: GetAssets
actions.description: Grants permission to describe assets associated to the requesting account

actions.name: GetProductAdvisories
actions.description: Grants permission to get all product advisories

actions.name: GetSoftwareVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to describe available software versions

actions.name: StartFileUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to start the process of uploading a Software file for AWS Elemental Appliances and Software Purchases
